name: Pyromanic Showdown
description:
The Narrative:

The belltower calls to action as the village burns - save your harvest & your homes as a trio of brave amphibian villagers fighting the flames or quicken the hamlet's fiery demise as the lone mad pyromancer! 

Pyromaniac Showdown is an isometric 1vs3 party game, pitting one player against three others in two different roles to battle over the control of the firestorm consuming the village.
